title: 02/17/21: Receive all your reports by email (daily or weekly)
content:
Emprez gives you the possibility to edit 
   management reports (employees, schedules, costs, timesheets, personalized banks ...)
  

   To follow up on one or more reports, and avoid having to edit manually, you can now schedule the daily or weekly sending of reports directly by email.
  




      To activate the option on your Administrator account, please send us a 
      ticket.
     



Once the option has been activated by us, go to the Reports menuÂ ,
Choose the report you want to receive by email,
Enter the desired fields,
Click on the envelope,
Fill in the fields:







Frequency: Daily or Weekly
Output: On some reports you have the choice between Excel or Pdf, on others only one of the two options is available
Recipient: Here, enter the email address where to send the report, separate by a comma to send to several recipients.
Email title: Email subject
Email body: The message that will accompany the report
